tswitem.name: Signet of Hermes' Feet
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Hermes' Feet
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you activate a movement ability, your movement speed is increased by 5%/10%/15% for 5 seconds. This Signet can be attached to Major Talismans. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
